## Quarto Render


```{r}
Sys.setenv(VROOM_CONNECTION_SIZE = 3062144)
#in files
source_files <- c("./01_load.qmd", "./02_clean.qmd", "./03_augment.qmd",   "./04_describe.qmd","./05_analysis_mouse.qmd", "./06_analysis_human_log_expr.qmd", 
                  "./07_analysis_human_log2fc.qmd")

# Out dir
destination_dir <- "../results/"

for (file in source_files) {
    # Render the file
    quarto::quarto_render(file)
    
    #get the html filenames
    output_file <- gsub("qmd$", "html", basename(file))

    # Full in and out paths
    source_path <- file.path(dirname(file), output_file)
    destination_path <- file.path(destination_dir, output_file)

    file.rename(source_path, destination_path)
}
quarto::quarto_render("../doc/presentation.qmd")

```
